title: Toy Block, ""Build the Town"", 1941
creditline: Gift of Radoslav L. and Elaine F. Sutnar
description: Six-sided block: two square faces painted white with two wide turquoise blue rectangles painted across center of each; two opposite rectangular sides painted orange with four stacked small white rectangles painted lengthwise down center of each; two opposite rectangular sides painted white with one large blue rectangle adjacent to one small blue rectangle painted down center of each.

tombstone.epitaph:
Toy Block, ""Build the Town"", 1941.
1941. Painted wood. Gift of Radoslav L. and Elaine F. Sutnar. 2000-76-1-10.
